skills.name: Mana Bubble
skills.description: Bursts a mana bubble that deals damage to an enemy and removes a beneficial effect with a 50% chance. The damage of this skill increases according to your MAX HP.

skill_effect.name: Remove Buff
skill_effect.description: Removes one or more beneficial effects from target monster(s)

skills.multiplier_formula: 2.5*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.12*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Grant Life
skills.description: Recovers the HP and Attack Bar of an ally target by 30% each. This skill may revive a dead ally with 30% HP at the cost of 3 additional turns being added to the cool time.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skills.name: Serenity
skills.description: Recovers the HP of all allies by 15% each, decreases their chance of receiving a Critical Hit for 2 turns, and grants them Immunity for 2 turns as well.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Immunity
skill_effect.description: Monster is immune to all negative status effects

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Resist
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate against the monster is reduced by 50%
